DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the dose response effect of probiotic capsules for the prevention of antibiotic-associated diarrhea (AAD).
DOC.brief_title: Dose Response Effect of Probiotics for the Prevention of Antibiotic-associated Diarrhea in Chinese Adults
DOC.criteria: age 3070 years initiating antibiotic therapy informed consent current diarrhea life threatening illness habitual probiotic use
